targets.query: SELECT mean("%_Interrupt_Time") as "% Interrupt Time", mean("%_Privileged_Time") as "% Privileged Time", mean("%_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time", mean("%_User_Time") as "% User Time" FROM "win_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("%_Free_Space") AS "% Free Space" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance
SELECT mean("%_Idle_Time") AS "% Idle Time" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance
SELECT mean("Current_Disk_Queue_Length") AS "Current Disk Queue Length" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance

SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") as "Available Bytes", mean("Pool_Nonpaged_Bytes") as "Pool Nonpaged Bytes", mean("Pool_Paged_Bytes") as "Pool Paged Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean("Cache_Faults_persec") as "Cache Faults persec", mean("Demand_Zero_Faults_persec") as "Demand Zero Faults persec", mean("Page_Faults_persec") as "Page Faults persec", mean("Pages_persec") as "Pages persec", mean("Transition_Faults_persec") as "Transition Faults persec" FROM "win_mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec", mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance

SELECT mean("Packets_Received_persec") AS "Packets Received persec", mean("Packets_Sent_persec") AS "Packets Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance
SELECT mean("%_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("Handle_Count") as "Handle Count" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("Private_Bytes") as "Private Bytes" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("Virtual_Bytes") as "Virtual Bytes" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("Working_Set") as "Working Set" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("Context_Switches_persec") AS "Context Switches persec" FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance
SELECT mean("System_Calls_persec") AS "System Calls persec" FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM win_system WITH KEY=host

list.label: Process Instance
list.name: win_proc
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_proc" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$server/
